descriptions:
['DescriptionWe are delighted to present this lovely two-bed apartment at Acacia in Dubai Hills Estate. 
This apartment features a built-up area of 1,341 sq. ft., with an open plan living room, dining room and fitted kitchen. The master bedroom is fitted with a walk-in closet, large windows, an en-suite bathroom with double sinks, shower and bathtub. The living room adjoins a balcony from where you can enjoy perfect views of the surrounding community on a quiet weekend afternoon. The finishing is of very high quality, as one would expect from Emaar.
Tailor-made for the very best in family living, Acacia offers plenty of amenities to its residents. These include an outdoor pool, play areas for children, a multi-purpose hall, open green spaces, plus jogging & bicycle tracks. You also have direct access to the championship Dubai Hills Golf Course, the Dubai Hills Mall, the beautiful Dubai Hills Park, international schools and world-class healthcare.
This is a very ideal choice for our discerning clients.']
